attrs.name: modelValue / v-model
attrs.desc: Set the default value of a region.

attrs.name: size
attrs.desc: Set the component size. The options are medium, small, and mini.

attrs.name: popper-class
attrs.desc: Add a class name for the popper. For details, see the popover component.

attrs.name: popper-append-to-body
attrs.desc: Indicates whether to insert the pop-up box to the body element. If a fault occurs in locating the fault in the dialog box that is displayed, set this parameter to false (for details, see the select component)
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: disabled
attrs.desc: Disable the text box. The default value is false

attrs.name: props
attrs.desc: Set the data mapping field when customizing a service. The default value is {label:'name_cn', //Display the field corresponding to the text value:'org_id' //Display the field corresponding to the value}

attrs.name: fetch-jcr
attrs.desc: User-defined service for obtaining regional JCRs

attrs.name: fetch-region
attrs.desc: Obtain the service of a region.

attrs.name: fetch-rep
attrs.desc: Obtain services of rep offices and rep offices.

events.name: change-region
events.desc: This event is triggered when the value of a region changes. The callback parameter is the changed value. value: new value, vm: Area component instance

events.name: change-rep
events.desc: This event is triggered when the value of Rep changes. The callback parameter is the changed value. value: new value, vm: Area component instance

events.name: change-office
events.desc: This event is triggered when the value of Office changes. The callback parameter is the changed value. value: new value, vm: Area component instance
